cloudServiceProviderInformation.providerName: string - name of the cloud service provider
cloudServiceProviderInformation.providerDescription: string - description of the cloud service provider
cloudServiceProviderInformation.serviceOffering: string - name of the service offering
cloudServiceProviderInformation.deploymentEnvironment: string - cloud environment in which the service is hosted

metadata.submissionDate: date - date of submission in YYYY/MM/DD format

families.familyID: string - unique ID of the KSI control family
families.familyName: string - name of the KSI control family

controls.id: string - unique ID of the KSI control
controls.description: string - Description of the KSI control
controls.implementationStatus: true or false - whether the control is implemented
controls.implementationStatement: string - implementation statement of the control

evidence.name: string - name of the evidence object
evidence.collectedDate: dateTime - date the evidence was collected
evidence.collectionType: string - how the evidence was collected. Can be AUTOMATED or MANUAL
evidence.fileType: string - filetype of evidence, file extension

auditStatus.status: string - leave empty., to be determined by the assessor
auditStatus.lastUpdatedTimestamp: dateTime - time at which this evidence was last evaluated
auditStatus.auditor_validation: string - signed hash to validate auditor
